QuestData.Title: Cascades of Magnitude
QuestData.Description:
Many of the creatures here at Dimensional Falls are particularly affected by the environment. Hmm... let us experiment with the waterfalls themselves!
We have seen unique effects from various natural components here in Zereth Mortis. Why not the water as well?
Collect some water, then sprinkle it on a creature in the Falls to see what happens.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Who knows what effect the water will have?
QuestData.LogDescription: Experiment with waterfall water in Dimensional Falls.

Objectives.Objective: Fill Water Beaker in one of the waterfalls
